doc:
Jay Jostyn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jay_Jostyn 0 Jay Jostyn (December 13, 1905 - July 24, 1977) (another source gives his lifespan as December 13, 1901 - June 25, 1976) was an actor in the era of old-time radio. He is best known for portraying the title role in Mr. District Attorney on radio. An article in Radio-TV Mirror in 1952 reported, "He is so generally believed to be a real life lawyer that he frequently receives mail from listeners inviting him to move to certain cities where they feel crimes are going unsolved." Jay_Jostyn ( December_13_,_1905 - July_24_,_1977 ) ( another_source gives his_lifespan as December_13_,_1901 - June_25_,_1976 ) was an_actor in the_era of old-time_radio . He is_best_known for portraying the_title_role in Mr._District_Attorney on radio . An_article in Radio-TV_Mirror in 1952 reported , " He is_so_generally_believed_to_be a_real_life_lawyer that he frequently receives mail from listeners inviting him to_move to certain_cities where they feel crimes are_going unsolved .
